Lunarpine smiles at the tigers lack of fear as he squeezed the 
trigger.
"So some poor kids gonna grow up without a little kitty to hug."

(It aint curiosity but it'll do.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> The tiger roared, showing it's long white teeth.  It looked at 
> Lunarpine and roared again.  It leaped at Lunarpine ready to bite 
his 
> head off.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > The tigers hesitation gave lunarpine the chance he needed, he 
drew 
> > his rifle and turned it toward the tiger.
> > "OK kitty one way or another we're gonna see what you're made of, 
> If 
> > you got the guts that is."
> > 
> > he took aim at its head.
> >
